text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Something you want... A new drug that you’ll take, 
an Umamusume specialized in speed. Like you, for 
example, and Believe by your side.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In return I’ll give you an annual pass to a cat café.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes. No. Believe told me that if someone 
proposes a gift in return, I must refuse.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I see. Now I know why you came along, Believe. You
might as well be a watchdog.

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text: I don’t want to get caught in any crossfire...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Then, how about an Umamusume who’ll take the old 
drug? It’s already been tested on several, side 
effects are just glowing a bit...

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: No. Believe says to refuse anything drug-related.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Very well... then I want your pacing data. A hundred 
runs will do.

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text:
Even things that take too long, a bit... In 
exchange, how about a “traditional dish recipe that 
boosts vitality”?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Not bad... Could be a foothold for my next 
development. Tell me it!
